state_summary: South Korea's Silicon Valley, Pangyo Techno Valley, struggles to live up to its global ambitions despite being home to many tech startups and big names like Naver and Kakao.
evidence: Pangyo is absolutely Korea's most concentrated hub for software, gaming, platforms, and AI
91.5% of companies in Pangyo are small and midsize businesses
Korean startups tend to balance ambition with discipline - building proof at home before going abroad
Breaking through takes more than ambition; it needs early global partners, deliberate go-to-market resources, and leaders who think cross-border from day one
keywords: Pangyo Techno Valley, Silicon Valley, South Korea, startups, tech
